name: default_2d
description: Fine-tuned StarDist 2D model for nuclear segmentation.

settings.label: Object diameter (px)
settings.tooltip: Estimated average nucleus diameter in pixels used for object-size scaling.

settings.label: Prob threshold
settings.tooltip: Minimum object probability required to keep a predicted nucleus candidate.

settings.label: NMS threshold
settings.tooltip: Overlap threshold for non-maximum suppression when removing duplicate detections.
